name: kickabout
comment: Five-a-side football. Tap and swipe players. Have fun!

body.text: Kick the ball at double the player's speed
Keepers simply adjust their position to the flight of the ball
Home side play the same way except the player currently being controlled
Defender stays on his two-thirds and inline with his post

thenBody.text: This is a two-two formation. Usually post to the wingers

elseBody.text: Worry about smart defending when the ball is in your half. This also provides the freedom to join the attack.

body.text: Stays on the goal line, follows the ball.
Tap to stop, really improves the detection of other movements

tokens.value: Would you like to exit? Please play again soon!

args.value: Would you like to exit? Please play again soon!
